mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type IN ('M', 'C') AND m.status = 0 AND m.visible = 0 AND m.deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.sort, m.id
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE status = 0 AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort, id
